[i](Gain the next level as a sorcery to add its ability.)[/i]
Flash
When Flash Fencer enters the battlefield target creature you control phases out. [i](Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.)[/i]
{2}{W}: Level 2
When this Class becomes level 2, create a 3/3 colorless Construct creature token.
{3}{W}: Level 3
Rejuvenate 4, then transform Flash Fencer. [i](Exile four cards from your graveyard, then you may play a permanent card with mana value 4 or less from among them until end of turn.)[/i]
rules_text2:
Double strike
Whenever Silvercoat Ethel deals combat damage to a player target permanent you control phases out. [i](Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.)[/i]
